flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=30>>30
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $30 / 2 = $<<30/2=15>>15
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $15 + $10 = $<<15+10=25>>25 to the shelter.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 30. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
